cr.title: Responsible Redeployment from Iraq Act
cr.topics: Responsible Redeployment from Iraq Act: WOODROW WILSON INTERNATIONAL
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I rise in strong support of H.R. 2956, the "Responsible Redeployment from Iraq Act." This legislation mandates that we begin withdrawing our troops from Iraq within 120 days of enactment. This redeployment would have to be completed by April 2008. This is a commonsense measure to bring an end to our military involvement in Iraq....
